roleset.name: to falsify or alter
roleset.note: DOCTOR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'doctor' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from doctor.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Members find it [*EXP*-1] easy [*]to doctor legislation by [*] slipping in special provisions that [*T*-2] could never survive in the cold light of day .
example.arg: by [*] slipping in special provisions that [*T*-2]could never survive in the cold light of day
